game.player

Enum PlayerState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<PlayerState>
      • game.player.PlayerState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PlayerState>

    public enum PlayerState
extends java.lang.Enum<PlayerState>
    Represents the different states a Player can be in.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann
    See Also:
    Player

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BUILD_FREE_ROAD
      The state which requires the Player to build a free Road.
      BUILD_FREE_SETTLEMENT
      The state which requires the Player to build a free Settlement.
      CONNECTION_LOST
      The state which indicates that the Player has lost their connection to the Server.
      DISCARD_RESOURCES
      The state which requires the Player to discard a resource card.
      MOVE_ROBBER
      The state which requires the Player to move a Robber.
      ROLL_DICE
      The state which requires the Player to roll the Dice.
      START_GAME
      The state which requires the Player to choose a name and a color and start the game.
      TRADE_OR_BUILD
      The state which requires the Player to trade or build something.
      WAIT
      The state which requires the Player to wait.
      WAIT_FOR_GAME_START
      The state which requires the Player to wait until the game starts.
